column4: Anyone know of any graphics cards that just work well on ubuntu? Right now I have a radeon 9600 but there is no 3d acceleration, plus its getting outdated so I want to buy a new one anyways
modern nvidia and amd-ati cards both work good
even Radeon 9600 with propietary drivers will be excelent card
I am running ati's propietary driver the most recent and right now it just throws me to the config to detect my card and display
